description:
Your Intelligent AI Translation Assistant
Translate Voice is an all-in-one AI translation app supporting over 200 languages. Speak, type, or take a photo for instant translation! Whether it's voice conversation, written text, or images, our intelligent translation makes cross-language communication smooth and natural.

Key Features:

-AI Chat Translation – Real-time bilingual conversations, just like online chat

-Text Translation – Accurately translate any written content

-Voice Translation – Speak for instant translation

-Photo Translation – Take a photo to translate signs, menus, and documents

-Image Translation – Recognize and translate screenshots and images

With support for over 200 languages, it's ideal for travel, study, or global business.

Most authentic Quran app since 2010.

Recognized by more than 65 million Muslim users around the world.

تطبيق القرآن الأكثر اعتمادا منذ عام ٢٠١٠.

معترف به من قبل أكثر من ٦٥ مليون مستخدم حول العالم.

Quran Majeed is an amazing Quran app that beautifies your life with the blessing of reading and listening to the Quran on the go. The latest version of the authentic Quran Majeed app for iPhone and iPad offers complete Quran in the elegant Uthmanic script, audio recitation, translations and English Tafsir Uthmani, proofread by a Muslim scholar ('alim).
القرآن المجيد هو تطبيق مميز للقرآن الذي يجمل حياتك ببركة القراءة والاستماع إلى القرآن أثناء التنقل. الإصدار الأخير من تطبيق القرآن المجيد لأجهزة الآي فون والآيباد تقدم قرآنًا كاملاً في الكتابة العثمانية الأنيقة، وتلاوة الصوت، والترجمات، والتفاسير، وقام بمراجعته أحد العلماء

● Worldwide Prayer Times clock with Azan/Adhan alarm options. Supports different prayer time calculation methods. Qibla direction. Ramadan Sehar/Iftar times
أوقات الصلاة لجميع أنحاء العالم مع خيار تنبيه الأذان، ودعم طرق مختلفة لحساب أوقات الصلاة، وبوصلة القبلة، وأوقات السحور والإفطار

● World famous reciters (Sheikh Abdul Basit, Sheikh As Sudays & As Shraym, Mishari Rashid, Saad Al Ghamdi, Abu Bakr Shatry, Sheikh Ahmed Ajmi, Sheikh Al-Huzaifi, Sheikh Mahir-al-Muayqali, Sheikh Minshawi, Sheikh Ayub, Khalil Husari, Mahmood AlBana, Salah Bukhatir & Sheikh Basfar).
تلاوات القراء المعروفون عالميا.

● Four English translations (Pickthal, Dr. Mohsin, Mahmood & Yusuf Ali) and forty-five language translations (AlBanian, Amazigh, Amharic, Azerbaijani, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Chinese, Divehi, Dutch, French, German, Hausa, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malayalam, Malaysian, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Sindhi, Somali, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tartar, Turkish, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek). 

● Option to display any translation along with full Arabic text in hi-resolution, Retina graphics in both portrait and landscape viewing. Supports pinch/zoom feature for changing font size.
خيار عرض أي ترجمة مع النص العربي الكامل بالدقة الممتازة في وضعي الأفقي والعمودي، دعم ميزة التصغير / التكبير لتغيير حجم الخط.

● Islamic greeting messages (Eid Mubarak, Ramadan Kareem, ...)
رسائل معايدة إسلامية (عيد مبارك، رمضان كريم، ...)

● Qibla Direction — اتجاه القبلة

● Hijri Converter — تحويل التاريخ

● Quran TV feature with beautiful background videos
تلفزيون القرآن مع مقاطع فيديو خلفية جميلة

● Visual Quran feature with flip gesture
المصحف المرئي مع إيماءة التقليب

● Watch live coverage of Makkah & Madinah.
شاهد التغطية المباشرة لمكة المكرمة والمدينة المنورة.

● Selectable themes (Green, Blue, Classic-Green, Night Mode, Light & Brown).
إمكانية اختيار الثيمات (أخضر، أزرق، الوضع الليلي، فاتح، بني)

● Advanced audio options to help with memorization (repetition of ayah, Surah, number of repetitions, interval, and recitation speed).
خيارات الصوت المتقدمة للمساعدة في الحفظ (تكرار الآية، وسورة، وعدد من حالات التكرار، وفاصل، وسرعة التلاوة).

● Highly advanced “Search” feature that can help with searching any word (search exact word, affixes or all roots) in the Arabic text, any of the translations and English Tafsir.
ميزة بحث متقدم يساعد في البحث عن أي كلمة ( الكلمة بالضبط، كل اللاحقات أو الجذور) في النص العربي، والترجمات والتفاسير

● Bookmarking of Aya, translation and tafsir (supports iCloud synchronization that helps your bookmarks stay up to date on all your iOS devices).
وضع علامة مرجعية على الأية، والترجمة، والتفسير للرجوع إليها

● Quranic Aya and word highlighting during recitation.
تظليل الآية والكلمة أثناء التلاوة

● Social media sharing. Ability to share selected aya via email, twitter & Facebook.
مشاركة في وسائل الإعلام الاجتماعية

● iPad friendly interface
تطابق واجهة أيباد

Terms & Conditions
https://pakdata.com/terms-and-conditions/

Privacy Policy
https://pakdata.com/privacy-policy/

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Build a stronger connection with your Deen, one day at a time.

Staying consistent with prayer. Making time to read even one verse a day. Remembering to say Alhamdulillah when life gets heavy. These are the habits that build Iman, and Muslim Pro is here to help you build them.

Whether you’re navigating faith at college, raising a family, or rediscovering prayer, Muslim Pro walks with you, every day, in every season of your Iman.

Designed to help you grow in faith:
- Prayer reminders (Athan) tailored to your location, helping you never miss a Salah
- Daily Quran goals to keep you reading and reflecting
- Track your progress with streaks, reminders, and reflections
- Guided Duas & Azkar, chosen for real-life moments
- Personalised Islamic content that fits your journey, your pace
- Discover halal spots & mosques nearby, even while travelling.
- Learn through short videos, articles & tips, no pressure, just progress

The Complete Qur’an Experience
- All 114 Surahs with audio recitations by renowned Qaris like Mishari Alafasy and Abdul Basit
- Word-by-word translations in English and other languages
- Tajweed color guides and recitation tips to improve your fluency
- Last read verse bookmarks & Ayah highlights
- Memorization mode with repetition, verse selection, and audio speed control
- Light & dark modes, font size adjustments for easier reading
- Verse, Surah, or keyword search
- Authentic Arabic script with Uthmani calligraphy
- Short Tafsir to help reflect on meaning
- Daily Ayah reminders to stay spiritually connected

Small steps lead to lasting change. Muslim Pro helps you stay motivated, feel accountable, and keep growing in your faith, day by day.


Unlock the full Muslim Pro Experience with Premium
Ad-Free Experience: Enjoy uninterrupted access to all features.
Exclusive Tools: Access offline reading, audio recitations, customizable prayer widgets, and interactive lessons.

Premium Subscription Plans
$12.99 per month
$34.99 per year

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing may vary in other countries, and charges may be converted to your local currency.
Subscriptions renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscription and auto-renewal settings in your Apple account.

Supported Languages
Muslim Pro is available in multiple languages, including English, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Melayu, Français, العربية, اردو, and more.

Pro Tips for the Best Experience:
Keep the app updated for the most accurate prayer times and reading features.
Enable auto-location to adjust prayer notifications based on your area.
Open the app daily for seamless access to verified prayer times, Qibla tools, a prayer space finder, and a Halal restaurant finder.

Stay Connected:

Instagram: @MuslimProOfficial
TikTok: @MuslimProOfficial
YouTube: MuslimProApp
Facebook: MuslimPro
Twitter/X: @MuslimPro

Discover Muslim Pro – Your trusted app for prayer times, recitations, alerts, Qibla, Halal Finder & more. Perfect your prayer routine and embrace your practice with ease.
Download Muslim Pro today and elevate your experience!

Bible Chat: Built for Christians Who Want to Hear God in the Noise of Everyday Life

Have you made time for God’s Word today? Join millions of believers who’ve chosen the #1 faith app in the world. Download Bible Chat today!

Life is noisy. Fast. Overwhelming. Even when you’re trying to stay close to God, it’s easy to feel spiritually disconnected.

Bible Chat is the ultimate all-in-one Christian app designed to make Bible reading, prayer, and Christian community a part of your everyday life. It is for Christians who want peace - real peace - anchored in Scripture.


Whether you're a lifelong Christian or just starting your journey, Bible Chat gives you everything you need to:

• Understand the Bible Better - Learn what the Bible really means with helpful guides and simple explanations that make God's Word easier to follow and apply.

• Grow Your Prayer Habit - Build a consistent prayer routine supported by daily  inspiration and the power of a praying community.

• Make Faith Part of Your Day - Improve your daily routine with spiritual prompts, Christian calendar reminders, and faith tools designed for the whole family.

• Support Your Mental Health - Find peace and calm in moments of stress with simple tools that help you refocus on God’s strength.

• Make Faith Fun and Interactive - Enjoy fun and easy ways to learn, think, and talk about how faith fits into your everyday life.


Key Features to Explore:

• Daily Plan: Stay on track with your faith. Follow a simple daily plan that helps you grow closer to God, one step at a time.

• Structured Bible Study Plans: Follow simple Bible reading plans made for real life. Some of the topics include: healing, wisdom, leadership, grief, and more.

•  Holy Calendar: See important Christian days in a monthly view. Never miss a feast, saint day, or holy event again.

• Panic Button: Struggling with stress or temptation? Tap the Panic Button for guided deep breathing exercises that calm the mind and provide anxiety relief.

• Live Prayer: Share your prayer intentions, and let's pray together to grow closer to God.

• Send a Blessing:  Send a Bible verse with a kind message straight to a friend’s phone. Add a heart or doodle to make it personal and uplifting.

• Bible Stories for Kids: Turn screen time into faith time! Show fun, Bible-based stories and videos to your kids.

• Multiple Bible Versions: Read the Bible the way you like best. Choose from NKJV, KJV, WMB, FBV, World English Bible, Amplified, and NASB.

• Bible Verse Widget: See a new Bible verse every day, right on your lock screen or home screen.

• Bible Trivia: Challenge and enhance your biblical knowledge through interactive trivia games.

• Verse Locator: Looking for a verse? Search and find it fast, along with what it means.

• Personalized Devotionals & Prayers: Start your day with custom devotionals and write your own prayers to stay closer to God.

• Biblical Character Profiles: Learn about the people in the Bible: their stories, struggles, and how God worked in their lives.

• Let's Discuss Faith: Join honest chats about how faith connects to your real life - like work, family, and relationships.


Experience More with Premium:
Unlock unlimited conversations, full access to every feature, and exclusive designs for your Daily Prayer Widgets. Start with a FREE 7-day trial, then choose our weekly plan at £4.99 or opt for extended plans for greater savings.


Privacy Policy & Terms and Conditions:
https://thebiblechat.com/privacy-policy/
https://thebiblechat.com/terms-and-conditions/


Join Our Thriving Community:
Join a friendly community of people who love God or are just starting to learn. With Bible Chat and the new Send a Blessing Widget, you can make Bible verses and prayer part of your everyday conversations.

Dua and Adhkar is a practical, user-friendly app, designed for everyday use by people of all ages. It features a carefully selected collection of Authentic  Duas and Adhkar, designed to bring success and peace to your life when put into practice. As Muslims, building a strong foundation in faith is essential, and this app is designed to help you achieve that goal.

Whether you're a new Muslim, a young child, or someone looking to strengthen their spiritual journey, this app is made for you. It’s simple and intuitive design ensures that anyone can benefit from it, regardless of their age or stage in life.

NO ADS!

App Chapters: 
• Azkar After Salah 
• Morning Azkar 
• Evening Azkar 
• Azkar before Sleeping 
• Daily Duas 
• Ruqiyah for protection 
• 40 Rabbana Duas 
• How to make up Missed Rakah 
• Hajj & Umrah 

Features: 
• Arabic, Bangla, Urdu translations 
• Reminders for Morning, Evening, Before Sleeping Azkar 
• 5 different fonts including Uthmani, Indopak and Bangla 
• Tasbih Counter 
• Add Personal Duas to App

Report Errors or Suggestions

If you come across any errors or have suggestions, please email us at admin@duaandazkar.com with supporting evidence or references to authentic Hadith. Once verified, we’ll address the issue in our next update.

Note: 
We have removed some supplications that were either not related to the specific chapters or were based on weak hadiths. Alhamdulillah, we have replaced them with authentic versions that directly relate to the chapters, especially in the supplications section.
القران الكريم كاملا بدون انترنت بجودة عالية بصوت الشيخ ياسر الدوسري

FREE PRAYER TIMES WIDGET:

Athan's new Free Prayer Times Widget, now available right on your device’s home screen! Instantly view accurate Namaz times, Azan times, and upcoming prayers without opening the app. This Islamic prayer widget is designed for quick access, so you’ll never miss a prayer. Whether you’re at home, work, or traveling, get the most reliable Muslim prayer reminders directly on your screen. Simple, convenient, and completely free for all users.


Complete the Daily Goals and start your spiritual journey:
Simplify your daily spiritual Islamic lifestyle with Athan. Complete the following Daily Goals and earn Hasanah:

- Log Your Prayer / Salah Progress
- Listen to Al-Quran / Ayah / Ayat
- Complete a Daily Tasbih / Dhikr
- Optional Tasbih / Dhikr (Tasbih Counter)
- Give Sadaqah (Optional)
- Offer Nafl Prayer (Optional)
- Customize Daily Goals as per your need

Athan is the most trusted prayer time app for accurate Salah times and also includes features: 
- Prayer Times with Azan Alarm:
- Athan Stories (short Islamic Videos)
- Al-Quran with Audio
- Dua & Athkar
- Qibla finder
- Menstrual Mode for Women
- Islamic calendar 2025
- Tasbih Counter
- Hajj and Umrah Guides


Azan Alarm & Prayer Times:
- Accurate prayer timings worldwide
- Listen to adhan five times a day by enabling azan notifications / azan alarm
- View the remaining time for each Salat & see accurate Muslim prayer times of the entire day

Athan Stories (short Islamic Videos):
Athan Stories is a feature where you can watch and learn new things about Islam on a daily basis through short Islamic videos.

Al Quran:
- Read the Holy Quran in English and other 45+ languages Translations & transliterations
- Bookmark surah & ayah of your choice Quran for iPhone
- Get 2 free Holy Quran themes
- Shareability of any ayah from the azan app on social media
- Lookup any word, surah or ayah in the search bar on Quran for iPhone
- Adjust font size & switch translations and transliterations on/off

Menstrual Mode for Women
Athan’s Menstrual Mode is a convenient experience for women's Prayer needs. 
- Mark Prayers as excused 
- Duas you can during menstruation
- Dua & Athkar reminder 
- Customized notifications

Dua / Athkar (Supplications):
- Quranic and masnoon supplications / athkar & dua
- Dua of the day card to strengthen your Imaan, daily Athkar & dua
- Listen to Duas with Dua Audio


Tasbih Counter:
- Count your daily Dhikr, Tasbihat and Wazaif with the help of Tasbih
- Complete Tasbeeh e Fatima with Tasbeeh Counter
- Tasbeeh Counter with dark and light color themes
- User friendly Tasbeeh Counter for Azkar and Dua’s
- Make Tasbihat and Azkar with Tasbih (تسبيح) counter/Dhikr Counter

Qibla Finder:
Integrated Qibla finder / Qibla compass / Qibla direction worldwide with the help of our Qibla finder feature

Gregorian and Islamic Calendar / Hijri Calendar:
- View current Islamic / Hijri & Gregorian calendar 2025 dates and Umm-al-Qura Calendar
- View list of Islamic events of Hijri year

PrayerBook:
- Know your Salat progress
- Track prayers by logging them in your personalized PrayerBook
- Never miss your namaz and get notifications of namaz timings during Ramzan

In-App Purchases:
- Enjoy smooth Ad free experience with Athan Pro version (Monthly and Yearly Subscriptions)

Note: Enable Auto settings to get the most accurate Islamic Prayer Times for your location.
Second, kindly rotate your phone and make an 8 in the air in order to get accurate Qibla direction

Follow us to stay connected.
https://www.instagram.com/athan.app/

App Features:
- Free without any ads.
- Listen to more than 200 reciters and 10 rewayas.
- Create custom playlists (automatically synced across your devices using iCloud).
- Download any surah, or play it directly over the internet.
- Play suras in the background.
- Customize playing options (repeating, seeking times, auto-stop and more).
- CarPlay, Siri Shortcuts, Widgets, and iCloud sync support.

---

مزايا التطبيق:
- مجاني بالكامل وبدون أي إعلانات.
- استمع لما يزيد عن 200 قارئ بأكثر من 10 روايات مختلفة.
- أنشئ قوائم التشغيل المخصصة (تتزامن تلقائياً مع أجهزتك باستخدام الآي-كلاود).
- إمكانية تحميل أي سورة أو الاستماع إليها مباشرة عبر الإنترنت.
- إمكانية تشغيل السور في الخلفية.
- إمكانية تخصيص إعدادات التشغيل (التكرار، زمن التقدم والتراجع، الإيقاف التلقائي، والمزيد).
- دعم الكار-بلاي، واختصارات سيري، والتطبيقات المصغرة (الودجتس)، والمزامنة عبر الآي-كلاود.

Get America's most useful and respected dictionary, optimized for your iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch. Continuously updated with the newest words and meanings, this is the premier iOS app for English language reference, education, and vocabulary building. 

Key Features:

* Offline access: Complete access to definitions and synonyms whether or not you're connected
* Voice Search: look up a word without having to spell it
* Word of the Day: learn a new word every day
* Word Games: fun, fast quizzes to test your vocabulary
* Favorite Words and Search History: keep track of the words that are most important to you
* Favorite Word Syncing Through iCloud: share your favorites between devices and on the Web
* In-app purchase: an ad-free experience + access to Kids, Medical, and Legal dictionaries 
* For Tablets: browse the entire dictionary with a scrolling index
* Apple Watch Extension: see the Word of the Day and find watch-sized definitions with voice search

Expert Word Guidance:
	
* Integrated Thesaurus: more than 200,000 word choices with examples of their use
* Example Sentences: understand how a word is used in context
* Audio Pronunciations: voiced by real English speakers, not text-to-speech robots

App Cloner: Dual Space is the ultimate solution for running multiple accounts, cloning apps, and managing dual apps on a single device. Whether you're managing personal and work social media, playing games with multiple IDs, or chatting across platforms, this app provides a smooth and secure experience without switching or logging out.

Top Features:

-  Dual App Support: Easily clone popular apps like WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, or Messenger and run two accounts simultaneously.
-  Multiple Game Accounts: Enjoy gaming with different player profiles on the same phone.
-  Custom App Icons & Names: Personalize cloned apps with custom names and icons for a clean, organized layout.
-  Create Your Own Avatar: Design a fun digital version of yourself to use across your profiles or in cloned apps.
-  App Locker (PIN Protected): Lock your cloned apps to protect personal chats and private data.
-  Direct Chat Access: Send messages on WhatsApp or Telegram without saving contacts to your phone.
-  Lite & Fast Performance: Designed to be lightweight, fast, and battery-efficient for smooth multitasking.

App Cloner: Dual Space combines power, privacy, and performance, making it the perfect tool for users who want to keep work-life balance, multiple social identities, and private app spaces on a single device.

What will you find in this Dua and Azkar Offline application?
 
- Complete dua and azkar after salat prayer equipped with Arabic, Latin, translation, and offline audio
- Complete guide to the 5 obligatory prayers
- Dua after salat (pray)
- Dua and Azkar for Sunnah Pray
- Morning and Evening Dhikr
- Daily Prayers (Hisn Muslim)
- Prayers of the prophets

All available for free, offline without the need for an internet connection, and without annoying advertisements. If you try and like this Dua and Azkar app, don't forget to submit your review and rating as an encouragement for us to develop this prayer and dzikir application better.

أقوال النبي محمد (ص)، هذا التطبيق يحتوي على كتب الحديث الستة الرئيسية: صحيح البخاري، صحيح المسلم، جامع الترمذي، سنن ابي داود،  سنن النسائي، سنن ابن ماجة في اللغة العربية.

Sayings of Prophet Muhammad (SAW), this app contains six major hadith books: sahih bukhari, sahih muslim, jameh tarmidhi, sunan ibe dawood, sunan nisai, sunan ibn maja in Arabic language.

◉ Sahih Bukhari is now also available in English & Urdu translation

Discover the power of words with the Oxford Dictionary, the definitive language resource trusted by millions around the world. This comprehensive app, powered by Oxford Languages, offers a wealth of linguistic tools to help you achieve your language goals.

■ 15 OXFORD DICTIONARIES AT YOUR FINGERTIPS: 
•	Access a vast collection of dictionaries for English, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Chinese, Italian, Hindi, Urdu, Portuguese, Japanese, Greek, Bulgarian, and Thai.

■ UNMATCHED LANGUAGE CONTENT:
•	The Latest Word Database from Oxford Languages
•	Explore over 1 million words, phrases, and definitions
•	Thesaurus Integration - find the perfect word with thousands of synonyms and antonyms
•	Audio Pronunciations - perfect your pronunciation with high-quality voice recordings
•	Etymology and Origins - uncover the fascinating histories behind words
•	Specialised Content - quickly locate topic-specific references
•	Word of the Day - expand your vocabulary one word at a time

■ KEY FEATURES AND INTUITIVE DESIGN:
•	Favourites - save and organize words into personalized folders
•	Recent - quickly revisit recently searched words
•	Auto-correction option - correct the spelling of any word, as you type it 
•	Spread the word! Share your linguistic discoveries with friends, colleagues, or on social media

■ ADVANCED SEARCH OPTIONS:
•	Search autocomplete - displays predictions as you type
•	Keyword lookup - search within compound words and phrases
•	Camera search - look up words in the camera viewfinder

** The #1 Catholic Bible App**

Designed to help Catholics read and understand the Bible, learn the teachings and tradition of the Catholic Church, and grow to live the life God is calling them to more fully.

Featuring the most popular Catholic Bible in America, the Great Adventure Catholic Bible, with the one-of-a-kind Bible Timeline® learning system that has helped hundreds of thousands of Catholics finally read AND understand God’s Word.

TOP FEATURES

ADVENT STUDY
Join Fr. Mike Schmitz, host of The Bible in a Year Podcast, for a special Advent study series called Waiting Well, only available in the Ascension App. From November 30—December 25, Fr. Mike shares daily video reflections, with reflection questions, scripture verses, and other bonus content to help you get the most out of the Advent season.

PRAY THE ROSARY
Fr. Mike Schmitz, Fr. Mark-Mary Ames, Jeff Cavins, the Sisters of Life, and Paul Rose lead recordings of the Joyful, Luminous, Sorrowful, and Glorious mysteries of the Rosary. Pray in English or Latin, with options to chant the prayers.

DAILY MASS READINGS + REFLECTIONS
Read the official Daily Mass readings and watch reflections from trusted Catholic presenters who dive deeper to unpack the readings each day. Pray also with guided lectio divina prompts directly in the app.

THE GREAT ADVENTURE CATHOLIC BIBLE
Read the full-text of the Great Adventure Catholic Bible, listen on audio with recordings from Fr. Mike Schmitz, get answers to 1000+ most-asked questions about the Bible, and dive deeper into each book and verse with the Bible Timeline® learning system and the Bible Guide.

PREP FOR SUNDAY MASS
Watch or listen to recordings of Fr. Mike Schmitz’s homilies and watch Encountering the Word where Bible scholar Jeff Cavins provides historical, Biblical, and spiritual context to the readings at Sunday Mass.

“IN A YEAR” PODCASTS
Get the best experience of the Bible in a Year, Catechism in a Year, and Rosary in a Year podcasts, with additional content, prayer aides, transcripts, answered questions, linked references and Bible verses, and more!

STUDY PLANS
Browse from 80+ study plans taught by leading Catholic presenters, including Fr. Mike Schmitz, Jeff Cavins, Dr. Edward Sri, Sarah Christmeyer, Jackie Francois Angel, and many others. Study plans are a companion to help you understand the Bible better, learn more about Catholic teaching, and strengthen you to more fully live the life God is calling you to.

SAINT OF THE DAY
Read daily reflections on the lives of the saints, following the memorials and feast days on the liturgical calendar.

CATHOLIC PRAYERS
Discover novenas, litanies, guided lectio divina and visio divina experiences, and more!

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS
All users can access the full text of the Bible, the full text of the Catechism, Daily Mass readings and reflections of the day, the full Rosary with all recorded voices, and all Ascension podcasts in the app for free.

To access all content and programs in the Ascension App, Ascension offers two auto-renewing subscription options:

$8.99 per month
$59.99 per year

(Please note these prices are for users in the USA)

Your Ascension subscription will renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Apple account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Please contact us at support@ascensionpress.com if you have any issues or questions.

Azkar App is your daily companion for enhancing spirituality and facilitating Islamic practices. It provides a comprehensive collection of authentic Athkar (remembrances) and supplications from the Qur’an and Sunnah, along with innovative features designed to meet the needs of Muslims in their daily lives.

Join millions of users and experience a complete spiritual journey with Azkar App, crafted to serve every Muslim.

Key Features
- Morning & Evening Athkar, Sleep & Wake-up Athkar, Prayer Athkar, and more: A modern and user-friendly interface with an audio player and repetition counter.
- My Athkar Section: Create and customize your own Athkar according to your needs.
- Qur’an (Reading, Tafsir, and Audio): Enjoy an eye-friendly reading experience with font and color customization, translations in multiple languages, and easy-to-understand Tafsir. You can also listen or download recitations by your favorite reciter.
- Khatmah: Set a Qur’an completion plan with daily reading reminders.
- Prayer Times, Qibla Direction, and Hijri Calendar: View the Islamic calendar, accurate prayer times, and Qibla direction, with a monthly prayer calendar that can be shared.
- Adhan & Full Adhan Alerts: Choose from a variety of Adhan voices with pre-Adhan reminders.
- Reminders Section: Create reminders for specific Athkar, supplications, or important events with customizable sound and repetition options.
- Daily Content Updates: Get Dua of the Day, Ayah of the Day, and Video of the Day with valuable tips and inspiring stories.
- Various Azkar: A variety of supplications with customizable backgrounds, ready for sharing.
- Ramadan Section: Essential Ramadan features including Prayer & Fasting Tracker, Daily Duas, Zakat Calculator, and more.
- Daily Quranic Benefits: Daily insights into Qur’anic verses for contemplation.
- Worship Trackers: Tools to track Athkar, fasting, and prayers, helping you stay consistent and improve commitment.
- Tasbih Counter: Perform electronic Dhikr with an easy-to-use digital Tasbih.
- Ruqyah (Islamic Healing): Authentic Ruqyah texts from the Qur’an and Sunnah, with an audio listening option.
- Prophet Muhammad’s (PBUH) Biography in Videos: Engaging video content about the life of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH).
- 99 Names of Allah.
- Surah Al-Kahf Reminder for Fridays.
- Hajj & Umrah Guide: Step-by-step instructions for performing Hajj and Umrah.
- Islamic & Ramadan WhatsApp Stickers: Updated Islamic and Ramadan sticker packs with easy export to WhatsApp.
- Istighfar (Forgiveness) Alerts: Get reminders for seeking forgiveness and making Dhikr at customizable intervals (e.g., every 10 minutes or once a day).
- Qiyam-ul-Layl (Night Prayer) Alerts.
- Live Activities & Widgets: Quick access to features like prayer times, Hijri date, various azkar, Khatmah, prayer tracker, fasting tracker, and more from the home screen and lock screen.
- Professional & Customizable Design: Choose your favorite background, and enable dark mode for a better visual experience.
- …and many more great features you’ll love!

Why Azkar App?
Azkar App is a comprehensive Islamic tool, combining authenticity with modern technology to fulfill your spiritual and daily needs.

Take this opportunity to increase your daily rewards and strengthen your connection with Allah. Download Azkar App now and embark on an uninterrupted spiritual journey filled with Dhikr and supplication.

Millions of Muslims around the world use Muslim Assistant app to see prayer times and find Qibla direction.

Muslim Assistant, the most downloaded prayer time application in all Muslim countries, includes many useful features.

MUSLIM ASSISTANT FEATURES

Prayer Times: The application shows you the most accurate azan times according to your location or region. If you want, you can receive prayer time notifications with Azan sound or with other sound options.

Qibla Finder: You can find Mecca and Kaaba on the map, and you can determine the Kaaba direction of your location in the most accurate way. With the help of Compass Mode, It is easy to see where the Kaaba is located even when you are offline, and you can pray according to Islamic rules.

Dhikr Counter: You can easily make dhikrs, record your dhikr counts and dhikr loops.

Friday Messages: You can send special Friday messages to your loved ones.

Nearby Mosques: You can see the Mosques and Masjids closest to your location on the map.

The Quran: You can read the Quran in 40+ different languages and there are also transliteration options. You can see the Juz list and change the text size as well. You have the option to listen to the Quran recited by famous reciters, providing a unique and diverse listening experience.

Kaaba Live Broadcast: You can watch the Kaaba live 24 hours a day.

Esma-ul Husna: You can see the 99 names of Allah and their meanings and listen to Esma hymn and make dhikr of each Name.

Hijri Calendar: You can follow the dates of important islamic days such as Ramadan, Laylat-ul Qadr, Eid al-Fitr and Eid al-Adha.

Message Editor: You can choose existing messages or compose new ones, with a variety of background options, using the editor tool and send your custom messages to your loved ones.

Notes:

For proper Qibla Finder usage, you need to hold your phone on a flat surface and keep it away from electromagnetic fields and metal objects. If it is necessary, you can manually rearrange your location through pressing the marker.

Because the app uses your device's location settings to give you prayer times, please kindly be aware your location settings are open and up to date.

May Allah bless us all.

description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.
